references.paper_title: Gambling in a rigged casino: The adversarial multi-armed bandit problem
references.reason: This paper is foundational for adversarial bandits, a setting also studied in this paper, introducing the adversarial multi-armed bandit problem and its theoretical analysis.

references.paper_title: Finite-time analysis of the multiarmed bandit problem
references.reason: This paper provides a finite-time analysis of the classic stochastic multi-armed bandit problem, which this paper extends to a new setting.
This book provides a comprehensive overview of bandit algorithms, the core topic of this paper, which is used for background and comparison.
This paper studies explore-then-commit strategies for standard bandits, which this paper adapts and analyzes for bandits with ranking feedback.
This paper introduces dueling bandits, a related problem to the one in this paper, and their theoretical analysis which is used to compare and contrast with the new model.
